description:
The GoXLR Driver package is deprecated due to no longer existing on the TC Helicon website.
      The GoXLR package should no longer require this driver package.
summary: The GoXLR Driver is the driver that controls the GoXLR Mixer hardware, the Revolutionary Online Broadcaster Platform with 4-Channel Mixer, Motorized Faders, Sound Board and Vocal Effects
author: TC Helicon
